website_summaries.verdict: Great for water sports, these polarized sunglasses are extremely lightweight – so lightweight that they float if they fall off in the water.
pros: Bamboo frame with polarized 55 millimeter lenses
Comes with bamboo case, cloth pouch, and microfiber cloth
Glasses float, so they are great for water sports
cons: The lightweight bamboo is brittle and can snap
The lenses could be higher in quality

customer_reviews.title: Lens quality may disappoint you.
customer_reviews.text: Although the frame and extras are nice, the most important part of sunglass besides the fitment, is the lens. The lens on this sunglass is not of high quality. And the price should warn you of this. I had to send it back, being used to quality lenses is something you need to think about before hitting the buy button.
customer_reviews.author: F. Ober

customer_reviews.title: They looked nice...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to drop a 1 star unless something is outright poor, or false. These are very light, and I'm sure they float as stated. However, the sunglasses aren't very...good at sunglassing. I found then hard to use driving and didn't help with glare or even indirect light. Overall a big disappointment. It didn't help the frames were a bit scuffed. I felt like half the price went into the packaging and swag it came with. Definitely not work $30+ dollars. $10...maybe. But still, they don't function well.
customer_reviews.author: Fitzyroo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my husband. Thought they looked pretty cool and the price point was good for how often he loses sunglasses. The main reason I purchased - the claim that they float because he loses sunglasses while he is paddling in his outrigger canoe. Figured this is perfect, he would be able to grab them off the water. THEY DO NOT FLOAT. They sink pretty damn fast actually. Not happy about that. But then, maybe a month and a half after ordering they are starting to peel. He doesn't even wear them very often. Would not recommend. And would like a refund actually.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B.

customer_reviews.title: Great but too much glare on inner lense
customer_reviews.text: I just got my pair yesterday. I tried them on, everyone said I looked cool and I thought Eurika! I now have a great pair of sunglasses! However... Today I took them outside for a real world test and they are just a no go for me. The glare on the inner lense from just about every angle is always there and distracting. It's like the glasses are dirty but they aren't It's just glare because there is so much light getting in around them. If I cup my hands around the glasses when wearing them, all that glare goes away, but I can't function like that for very long. Especially while driving. :-) I will unfortunately return them. :-(
customer_reviews.author: JimS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are great glasses. They are light weight and yes float in the water. I would also recommend these sunglasses if you have longer eyelashes. My son has longer eyelashes and has a hard time wearing sunglasses because his eyelashes hit, but not with these. He loves them. They are a dark tint which is perfect all year round (the sun reflects the snow in the winter).
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Comfortable and Cheaper!
customer_reviews.text: So i had another pair of wooden glasses, and i loved them, I bought it from a startup company from my college. Unfortunately, they got stepped on 😭 I found these after searching all of Amazon. I couldn't bring myself to spend another $50 on wooden glasses, so i found these and i must say these are better than what i had bought previous. The wood is comfortable, and had a nice feel to it. They fit great, and look great too!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Environmental sustainability is ruined by multiple layers of plastic
customer_reviews.text: If you're spending $30 on bamboo sunglasses, it's quite likely that, like me, you're avoiding plastic and trying to do the right thing for the environment. So why are "environmentally friendly" sunglasses encased in multiple layers of plastic? They are wrapped in plastic, placed inside a plastic bag, enclosed with a cloth bag that is ALSO encased in plastic, placed in a cute bamboo cylinder (not sure what we will use that for), encased in ANOTHER plastic bag, and then shipped. Enclosed is a business card and two plastic stickers touting these "eco friendly" sunglasses. Huh? We won't be buying these again unless they get their act together on true environmental sustainability.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Pags

customer_reviews.title: Even when they arrived I was pleased about their look and quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and was really excited! Even when they arrived I was pleased about their look and quality. Living in Florida and working on the water I loved that they were polarized and float! They do float also! I had to test it out of course! About a week and a half of wearing them every day, the lense started getting air bubbles on the bottom and started to over take the lense. I returned them and will be buying from another company. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improperly made lenses, with mirror coating on both sides
customer_reviews.text: These glasses have the mirror coating on BOTH sides of the lenses, which I've never seen in any sunglasses. I didn't get a great photo, but they're equally mirrored on both sides. This makes wearing them very uncomfortable and glaring, and it also makes the color of everything appears to be a wine red/purple. I tried to take a photo through the lens to compare what it looks like. It's very bizarre.
customer_reviews.author: Nate & Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Great design and material, ....lot of glare sadly...
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about these glasses, the packaging is great, the material has that delicious worked wood scent and the design is pretty cool, only reason why I'm not giving it 5 stars is because they do get pretty shiny on the inside, meaning they glare a lot, if it;s very shiny outside they'll help but at the same time you'll see a reflection of your eyes or cheeks more than whatever you have ahead, sometimes I have to take them off for a second cause I can actually see better without them.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Unique Shades
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are nice, unique design and cool that they're made of wood. They include a bamboo holder, cloth cinch bag, cleaning cloth, and card reporting a tree was planted with purchase. All great things! The highly reflective nature of the lenses is great from the front, but creates glare due to light reflection bouncing back on sides to eyes and face while driving. Lenses due increase crisp clarity, through a subtle pink filter. These are certainly more for fashion than for sport, or practicality. Therefore, for looks alone I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Big Poppa

customer_reviews.title: These sunglasses are amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are amazing for the price. i ordered them for the pool and to go on vacation. yes they float ! i have worn them all day and they are extremely comfortable. very light. the lenses work great against the sun UV. everyone that has seen them and tried them on want a pair. they are more comfortable than my $150 pair. hope they are durable and last because i love them. do not hesitate to buy a pair , you wont be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: penny I love amazon

customer_reviews.title: They do not float and sunk in less than 30 sec
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my stepdad for Father’s Day. He wore them for the first time today and as he was getting of the boat they fell and got lost in second. I specifically got there cause per the description they were lightweight and he wanted something like this to use while boating. Gave 2 stars cause they’re super cute but I’m extremely disappointed since I paid almost $50 bucks for them. I’m hoping seller would replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Anay Baster

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses, great price, awesome craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses! They are quite well made and sturdy feeling, and hold up pretty well to dropping and wear and tear. Being polarized is a huge plus as well, and they are very good at blocking out the sunlight while driving or doing anything really. The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is, although the spring-loaded outward flex on the arms is nice to help fit larger heads (like mine) and prevent accidental breaking, the springs themselves aren’t very strong and the glasses tend to slip off your head If you’ve got them propped up on top, or if you make too sudden of a movement. All in all, I’ll probably get more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Darin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit head and weird shaped lenses
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try these out in hawaii and for the price I thought I would get some decent sunglasses that would float. That was not the case, frames were too large for my head (and I usually wear "regular" in RayBans, also the shape of the lenses are weird and seem off. $35 later and I can't return them....
customer_reviews.author: Katie C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product and Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Have had two pairs of these great glasses. First pair broke to carelessness. Awesome that they float and are made of bamboo. Came with a bamboo case, as well as cloth pouch and microfiber cleaning patch. Great company that plants, 2 plants for every purchase. Customer Service (Karrissa) took care of my one issue immediately. Highly recommend. P.S Keep them away from spray sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Baker

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband. He wore them ONCE in the ocean and the blue started coming off, leaving his with black circles all over his lens. I tried to contact the company, and I don't know if maybe the message didn't properly send or if they just didn't respond. (I will give them the benefit of the doubt because I see they have a good response rating.) I would recommend the solid color with no coating on the lenses. They did float like advertised. We loved everything else about them but bummed he only got to wear them once and had to ditch them.
customer_reviews.author: Erica West

customer_reviews.title: Too fragile
customer_reviews.text: They sure do look cool and float, but they lack in other areas. They fit me pretty tight, but that's not the glasses fault, that's my big head. What is the glasses fault is how incredibly slippery the inside of the frames are, they really need a little piece of rubber or something to keep them in place. But the biggest problem is how brittle they are. They are not sturdy glasses. The bamboo is very fragile and will break under very, very little pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: They actually work! Already return another brand of "floating" glasses because they sunk right to the bottom when I tested them out. Bought these the river just in case they get knocked off my face, hopefully I'll be able to find them easier if that happens. Only thing I'm not a fan of is how big they are on my face but all the floating glasses seem to be the same style. I dont care to much though since they will only be worn at the river. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: J Freeland

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses. Seems though that they are small in frame size so the side peices must flex out when you put them on. Nothing wrong with this as they are built to do so with the hinge on them they do flex out fine. But I did notice that one side of mine flex out more than the other and when on my face I feel like that causes them to sit crooked(one eye lense further away from my eye than the other). I could be wrong though. Just my opinion
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: First impressions are great, Love it
customer_reviews.text: First impressions are great, Love it and I will continue to update this review when my summer adventures come along Update!! These sunglasses met an unfortunate end on a river trip, I had flipped over in a kayak and when I surfaced I still had the classes on but the side has snapped in half. Will be ordering a new pair
customer_reviews.author: Neil Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Dont last long
customer_reviews.text: They were outa stock near whole summer and once i got the kind i wanted they lasted a month and looked to return or get new pair and my return date was couple days shy which sucked... there might weight kinda wear small to the head and don't let them hit the ground at all it will break. The style is what attracts me to them but wish they were stronger
customer_reviews.author: JoshuaS

customer_reviews.title: Great shades for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sunglasses! Light weight. They float, which is good for summers out on a lake or in the ocean. And you can't beat the price for a shades that are also polarized. Great design as well. Love these!!! Edit: Just wanted to add how great their customer service is. Had these sunglasses stolen at a gig I was playing unfortunately. Contacted their customer service to see when they'd be back in stock and without even asking for any kind or deal or discount, they sent me a free pair to say thank you for my business. Just thought everyone should know this is a great little company with a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are great especially for the price. They were well packaged and contained no blemishes upon opening the box. Two cool things I was unaware of but pleasantly surprised about was the shades came with an aspiration printed on the inside of one of the temples of the glasses. The other being their two for one business model (plant two trees for one pair of sunglasses sold) is pretty cool too. I have had these sunglasses for a little over a week and seem to be quite durable. Of course, only time will tell, as for now I am thoroughly pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered four pairs of these sunglasses. I love how buying these help with the planting of trees with every purchase. Awesome super stylish glasses but the thing is they are very fragile especially on the frame closest to the nose. Although on this last purchase I had received there was already a crack on the frame is the location I mentioned before and on the opposite side I has already started seeing a slight crack that could easily split if I breathed on it too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Silang

customer_reviews.title: The best shades I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!!! One of the best sunglasses I've ever had. They fit great, look amazing, I barely feel that I have them on. Come in a really nice wooden case so I know I won't break them when I take them off. Delivery with this seller is really quick. Ordered them I think on Friday and got them on Monday. I also got a little card saying " THANKS! You have directly contributed to planting 2 trees". I will be ordering more of these shades real soon!
customer_reviews.author: Kororowo

customer_reviews.title: Broke the second time I wore them
customer_reviews.text: They cracked by the lenses and the lense fell out. They do float I just thought for the price they’d be more durable. I work on a lake on a dock so I was excited to see them float. I liked the security of them not sinking but I can’t wear them now. I’m really disappointed that they couldn’t handle being worn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and unique
customer_reviews.text: Took it to the beach and it is great. Love the style and very unique. The shades does look like it would be thin and cheap but it isnt. i got the silver mirror reflection on it. So it doesn't seem see through. I really love the design on the sides and looks durable
customer_reviews.author: Bryan H

customer_reviews.title: They look great, but seem flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: These look great and fit well. Lenses are awesome. I don't find myself squinting so much. Here's why they only get 3 stars. They feel fragile. Really fragile. I'm almost afraid to wear them. The hinge part on the left side is a little wobbly and one side flexes out further than the other. I bought two pair. One bamboo and one pine. They both feel the same. I'll wear them till they break, I just have a bad feeling that won't be very long.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: These came surprisingly quick and well packaged. Inside the ...
customer_reviews.text: These came surprisingly quick and well packaged. Inside the box was the roll and in it were the glasses wrapped in one plastic and the bag and cloth in another. I opened then expecting acetate printed on our a crack or cheap hinges. What I got were the double hinges giving bigger range of movement and comfort and a full well painted and etched frame. I mean these things are beauties.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and unique pair of shades that float!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sunglasses for use on, in, and near a river, and I can indeed confirm that they float! The design on the sides looks great, but the sides are also just a tad wider than expected. The polarization works very well in direct sunlight. Although one hinge seems a bit more giving in the opposite direction, take care of them as directed (in the helpful emails provided by the company after purchase) and your glasses will be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ellwanger

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese Overpriced Sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. I expected higher quality for what I paid. They don’t stay on my face, because the nose piece is made of polished wood. Maybe a rubber nose piece would be better. These are the quality you get from Aliexpress. I have bought a few pairs of sunglasses straight from China for under $10 with the same quality. I just didn’t want to wait 30 days for delivery, so I bought here. Is it really necessary to mark up cheaply made Chinese sunglasses so much?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for birding
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sunglasses specifically for use in #birding. The lenses are flat, for use with binoculars, and the color transmission has good clarity. On top of that, I like the fact that the frames use bamboo instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: The Other J. Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: These are great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price. They look great, they're polarized and they're made from renewable bamboo. The frame tends to get scuffed if you rub it against a rough surface, but you get what you pay for. I was also very happy with their customer service. I bought a pair from their 50/50 collection and the lens was not completely flush in the frame. I sent them an email with a picture and they immediately responded and sent me a replacement pair with no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Richie castro

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, unique detailed packaging
customer_reviews.text: Very light, unique, comfortable, unique detailed packaging, I am sure the price point being as high as it is for these is due to all the elements that go into this, but to have two trees planted per order makes it worth it, over all very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Italia30

customer_reviews.title: Super light
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are extremely light, which makes them very comfortable while wearing. They look really nice and the design is awesome. They also make them so the sides bend out just enough to be able to fit them on your head a little easier. The only down fall to these sunglasses is since they are so lightweight they have a hard time staying when I put them on top of my head so when I walk into a store or whatever else they fall off the top my head constantly so I have to find somewhere else to put them when not in use. Other than that I love these, I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shara

customer_reviews.title: Nice sunglasses but don't float as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a friend, telling him they were supposed to float since he's lost glasses before in the water. As soon as he gets in, they sink right to the bottom. Pretty embarrassing since I made a big deal about them being floating glasses. He shrugged it off as no big deal and said he'd keep them anyway, but what a waste of money. Only giving two stars because they looked nice.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Martin

customer_reviews.title: Quality and feel good buying
customer_reviews.text: Love these shades, cost effective and light weight. No sticky plastic and you're planting trees. So feels good to wear and feels good wearing them. English is a tricky language. I recommend buying these if you're in the market for shades
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Broke easily
customer_reviews.text: My glasses broke after five days of careful use. I'm out of the USA right now and can't return them by the required timeline. I would appreciate some customer service to contact me please.
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Fit good on an adult head no scratches out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit good on an adult head no scratches out of the box, also purchased a higher priced pair of polarized glasses, you get what you pay for no comparison to them,They are great for everyday use and won't feel as bad when I leave them at the gym. I like the lightness and wood feel we will see how durable they are .
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Good looking glasses, but they run on the big side
customer_reviews.text: I really like these glasses. They polarization and color is good, and combined with the nice carved patterns on the sides and they're a new favorite of mine. I rate these at 4/5 instead of 5/5 for two reasons. The first is the frames are thicker than I'd like, but it's not unbearable at all. The second is that they are fairly loose fitting and theres no way to tighten them, and that's coming from a guy with a head on the big end of the spectrum. I'd be careful if you've got a smaller head, these might just be too big for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Sandell

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my brother. They were what I excpected to get. Super cool Design. Very light weight. Nice tube it came in. As far as speed of getting the product, packaging, and design the product is great. I will have to see how they hold up once I give them to my brother.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: and the hard case is a nice bonus. (The case does smell heavily like wood ...
customer_reviews.text: The construction of these glasses is high quality, especially for the price, and the hard case is a nice bonus. (The case does smell heavily like wood glue for a few days) They fit well, but they lose a star for the hinge springs that others have mentioned. The springs are really weak, and it causes the glasses to be kinda loose on your face. That's really the only factor that keep these from earning 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Willowbrook

customer_reviews.title: Which bothers me because it makes them look dirty. Other than that perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: There are light weight, for sure fit my big head. They float for sure I got pushed in a pool and they were at the top of the water waiting for me. The only reason I'm not giving 5 stars if they are shiny on the inside and sometimes I can see my own eyes. Which bothers me because it makes them look dirty. Other than that perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: If you can’t make them reliable at least they are easy to fix.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, all day comfortable, good optics for the money. Wood glue and a rubber band are your friend with these sunglasses. Both of my pairs broke on the lense surround where the bamboo is thin, easy to fix but a bit annoying. On the plus side when my Ray bans broke in a similar spot when out of warranty they became disposable, at least these are fixable.
customer_reviews.author: Larry P.

customer_reviews.title: Sunglasses look great, but are very fragile
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sunglasses prior to a 2 week vacation to Europe. The look and fit was great, but sadly they broke on the second day of use and I was without sunglasses for several days. The bamboo is very thin and weak around the lenses. The wood grain is running the wrong direction in this area and provides little strength. A layered "plywood" construction would provide more durability. Anyone active should avoid these sunglasses, as they will not last. Sunglasses with a composite frame and wood / bamboo arms may hold up better and provide a similar aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Dlaw

customer_reviews.title: I love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses, they are a bit big but work perfectly. only thing i wanted to say is that 3 months in the Mirror on one lense has a bare spot already. so im not sure how long they will hold up. but they have not cracked or snapped. Update: Service was quick to respond to my email and my glasses are under warranty and will be replaced when they come back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: They're surprisingly resilient. I have dropped these at least 5 times (by accident) from about 5 feet onto a concrete floor. And they're holding up fine! And of course, I love the way they look. The fact that they come in 2 sizes means you can find something to fit you better than the 1-size-for-all types.
customer_reviews.author: speaklikedavid

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These floated really well. Husband kept taking them off and throwing them in the water to “show off” that they floated 😂 also nice style and they held up through our vacation to Cabo. Also bought another brand on here for less money and those didn’t work as well. (He’s the one with the bandana on)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Present
customer_reviews.text: I got these for Fathers Day and my step dad loved them! They actually float in water and look great! The unique design on the sides looks awesome and for the price this is such great eyewear for the lake, pool or beach. Would totally recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tacila

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is studying to be an optician and has worked in eyeglass sales for many years, but these even impressed him! I thought they would just be a cool novelty but he loves them. They're lightweight, good quality, and they float so they're perfect for all the water activities we do. Plus they look pretty cool too.
customer_reviews.author: smele

customer_reviews.title: For the price these are great, bought mine for a cruise and loved them
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are great, bought mine for a cruise and loved them, they are a bit weak so you do have to be somewhat careful with them, broke the hinge on mine accidentally sitting on them, my fault so cant hate the product for my mistake, will definitely be ordering some more different designs of these
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good value, look great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my boyfriend. They look great on him! I’ve borrowed them and the polarization is good and good quality overall for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy if the seller is CDQ
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift. They were a little small, but big enough. The design on the side is really neat. Just be wary of the seller. DO NOT buy if the seller is CDQ. Make sure its 4est. The other company sent the completely wrong thing then wanted to fight about it when I wanted a refund. Anyways. The sunglasses are great and they come in a really cool protective case.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rudiger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: 4est are the only glasses I buy there well put together hard to scratch great in the sun they float there made of wood and for every pair bought they plant two trees
customer_reviews.author: cdcoppola26

customer_reviews.title: Lens are not really good for me.
customer_reviews.text: As usual, Amazon was fantastic, but I can't give five stars to this particular pair of glasses. The reason why I don't like them is because the lens: polarized but after half an hour my eyes went red and I had a little headache, I tried severals time during the day and I think it happend because the lens are not really good. Personally, I'm not so sensitive to my eyes but this is the results after some days I wore them. I sorry because I like this brand and the color, but I can't wear them anymore in this condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lux9nIne

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy. Dark lenses. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, great buy. They are VERY dark lenses which really helps block out the sun. Only possible con would be they are very light/weak because they’re real wood. So they do break fairly easy. I broke my first pair being careless after about a year. But they were so nice I bought them again and they are so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely an eye catcher
customer_reviews.text: These are great fitting sunglasses and I constantly get positive comments on them. They do not get hot when left in my hot car in the summer which is nice. The springy hinges work well and they seem durable so far. 7 months later the lenses are separating in three places.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sixpack

customer_reviews.title: At least the trees they planted should last longer
customer_reviews.text: Frames cracked within 3 weeks. These are headed for the landfill where thankfully the frames will decompose in only 100 years instead of 1000. 2 stars given for the clever cause marketing (Banboo is better for you and the environment!) and the fancy bamboo holder that fits my new plastic shades that arrived today (sorry earth!)
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kafka

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool but the sides stick out and pick up ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool but the sides stick out and pick up a glare. Lenses are good, fit is comfortable, and a cool look. They don't feel like they're made out of actual wood though. Feels like plastic to me.
customer_reviews.author: Chase the Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wood>plastic
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I had my trepidation’s about wooden frames, but these are quite excellent. The packaging was top notch and the glasses themselves are super comfortable and great on the boat. I’ve had a ton of people ask me about them. 10/10, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Claude Upthegrove

customer_reviews.title: Super fly shades
customer_reviews.text: This glasses are the bees knees! Everyone compliments them when they see the carved design but when they realize it's wood it blows them away! I will be buying a few of the other color options soon.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Good glasses, lasted almost 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: I really Liked these glasses. Have traveled with them quite a bit, including using lake fishing, swimming in the ocean, theme parks etc. They survived everything... up until I took them into the pool at our apartment. Not sure if the chlorine would have damaged them when i bought them or not. Either way good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: M. Romero

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SUNGLASSES, I receive lots of compliments for them
customer_reviews.text: GREAT SUNGLASSES, I receive lots of compliments for them. The polarized lenses are amazing. I was able to attend a Baseball (night Game) and didn't take my glasses off at all. They were so clear and Crisp. The frames are so light I didn't even notice I had them on. The Workmanship on the frames every detail is outstanding. I have friends that are ready to purchase a pair and I will be purchasing another for myself. THANK YOU 4EST SUNGLASSES...THESE ARE OUTSTANDING SHADES. !!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: David Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, light weight
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a pair of wood polarized sunglasses for a while. I really like the look of these. They are comfortable and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B

customer_reviews.title: The cherry wood broke on one of the green Lines ...
customer_reviews.text: The cherry wood broke on one of the green Lines within about a month of having them. Just had them in my front pocket when somebody came and gave me a hug. Broke on the inside nose. Ended up reordering the plywood ones which have lasted a lot longer. However the lenses are a slight bit cheap even in this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: They don’t float.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sunglasses but they do not float. I spent a little more on the shaded to find one I won’t lose in the lake. Pretty dissapointed they’re advertised as floating and clearly they don’t
customer_reviews.author: R. Cline

customer_reviews.title: These do NOT float
customer_reviews.text: I bought these solely because they said they float. First thing I did was put them in a tub of water. They do NOT float. I am very disappointed. Otherwise they seem to e a decent pair of sunglasses. They feel like plastic and they come in a really nice hard case with a soft case as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses with customer service to match!
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and feel very snug, I've seen reviews saying they crack if you drop them but so long as you don't drop them you should be A-ok. Super glad I bought these glasses because they feel great, look great, and support a great cause. While the glasses are amazing, the customer service is equally as good, as soon as my order was registered as delivered, a 4est representative reached out to make sure that my glasses found me okay and volunteered to get to the bottom of it if they hadn't. Their willingness to fix any hypothetical wrongs that didn't even happen really puts this company at a step above the others.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary K.

customer_reviews.title: 4EST SHADES ARE WOOD WORK AT ITS BEST
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shades and actually may get a 2nd darker color ... :-) ... also love the concept of trees being planted as well - *2 thumbs up*
customer_reviews.author: Rita Gouse

customer_reviews.title: These sunglasses are beautiful, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are beautiful, sturdy, they are very well made. Bought this as a gift and the person was impressed abd looks forward to being a fan of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked at hinge
customer_reviews.text: I really do love these sun glasses BUT... they are really fragile at the hinges. I take good care of my sunglasses as I prefer to hold on to them for a long time but this have cracked on me twice now at the hinge point where the wood is extremely thin. I glued them back together the first time but now it is cracking again I am more than a little disappointed as I thought these would be stronger being made of bamboo and all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, float, and look damn good
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair, I put my first pair in my jacket and put that jacket on a chair which someone sat on. Love the light weight feel and the blue mirror finish. They do in fact float and love to take them to the beach or pool.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Granby

customer_reviews.title: dont waste  your money
customer_reviews.text: so cheap!! dont waste your money. I was not excpecting Oakley's or ray bans but seriously? just aweful. wore one time and filed in "file 13"
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Company is unwilling to deal with you.
customer_reviews.text: I got these thinking they were and priced well. A few days into getting them the frame creaked very easily, i reached out to the company and they told me that i would have to go else where for a solution. I wouldn't waste your money on these and also not very dark at all.
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FLOAT/ already lost
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband a and on father day today. It fell in the water and was never seen again! This is a scam!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Sue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing glasses they are light weight, fit real comfortable and the nose, the only thing about this is the can crack real easy other then that I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wilkie

customer_reviews.title: He likes them. Said they were assume.
customer_reviews.text: They were for my son. Now that summer is here he will be wearing them when he is out on the lake in his pontoon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: cheaper than most, cool design etched into sides, beautiful, light, and polarized. I didn't try and take them into the water so I do not know if they actually float as advertised. Love the case, it keeps them safe.
customer_reviews.author: Bardoman

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo frame not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had the glasses a little over 3 weeks and the frame cracked in the lens/bridge area. Also the right lens looked like it had a scratch in it, but it looks like it was missing some of the coating. Other than that the glasses were very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Harold S.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and fit great. They are polarized and the case is just ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive shades for the cost. Light weight and fit great. They are polarized and the case is just a bonus add on!
customer_reviews.author: SpongeDaily619

customer_reviews.title: i personally didn't listen to the reviews thinking it was operator error or poor handling of the sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: arm broke within a week. i personally didn't listen to the reviews thinking it was operator error or poor handling of the sunglasses. nope. they effed the screw up on the left arm. wasn't tightened correctly. lenses are great. shape is great. got so many compliments during the first few days. none now that i can't really wear them anymore.... waste of money.... find a product that's built to last
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: good sunglasses, not my favorite shape, needs more curve for my preference on the face
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please fix issues and I will buy these for life
customer_reviews.text: Unweable due to the lenses. It is a great idea. It is a little thicker than you think, but the lenses are not only crap, but they warp and you can see your own eyes. Please please fix this issue!
customer_reviews.author: Debra A Kinkaid

customer_reviews.title: 4EST does a great job
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I've purchased. One, because they float, two because the first pair was and is so awesome. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Cerase

customer_reviews.title: Inner glare
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of glare on the inside of the lens which makes it super glarey.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Spungo

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for a friend but liked them so much - looking to get a pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a friend but liked them so much - looking to get a pair myself reached out to the 4est company inquiring about when they plan to restock amazon next - and they were very helpful and prompt in responding back
customer_reviews.author: Angad Kumar Kapoor

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: great pair of glasses, super light. they look good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these shades
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shades. I’ve had a recent fascination with wood products, and this one whets my appetite. It’s beautiful, from the onset of the packaging that it came in, I was impressed. I love both the bamboo case, and pouch. Nice touch. It’s light as they say it is, and polarized. The design etchings on the handles I think make the glasses truly unique. Definitely recommend, and I would get a second pair in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kencil

customer_reviews.title: Rad Shades!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shades..very well made, dig the detail and lazer etching fit perfect and very light can barely feel on my face! The carrying case and bag are nice touch too deff plan on making these last as long as possible. Heh everybody's asking where I got em so I'll send them your way!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every Handmade touches my heart
customer_reviews.text: I loved it and this is my second time to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Alsuhaibani

customer_reviews.title: Came in plastic bag with white mark
customer_reviews.text: Company pictures show microfiber cloth, carrying string bag and case. I got a plastic see through bag and a white mark on one side of the sunglasses. Also didn’t fit my big head... someone with a smaller width head may be okay with these. Ask for everything in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Chevaschan K.

customer_reviews.title: Most stylish and functional you can find for the $
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, design, function, and style at a great price! I hunted for great floating wooden sunglasses for a few weeks and was amazed to find these great looking glasses for such a steal of a price. I enjoyed them so much I bought myself another pair and my girlfriend her own pair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are some great sunglasses, I'm really suprised at the quality and that they aren't charging more. The polarized lenses are quality I would compare them to $150 sunglasses
customer_reviews.author: Reginald Fifer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pair of sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I Totally recommend these sunglasses. They’re really lightweight; you can almost forget you’re wearing them! Also, they have a sorta tribal design on their “legs” (sorry, English is not my mother tongue). My friends have asked me about them, and have said that they’d buy a pair if they could find them in Chile. I told them that there’s international delivery, but it could get pretty expensive. Nevertheless, i’m really happy with my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

customer_reviews.title: The coverage is good, and the UV protection is as good as ...
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, unique, light and well constructed. The coverage is good, and the UV protection is as good as it gets for a pair of shades that are not branded. They are well constructed, while the reflective lens is very cool.
customer_reviews.author: holagranola

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend the sunglasses to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. These glasses are stylish and unique. From day one I received many compliments on them people thought they were very expensive. I would definitely recommend the sunglasses to anyone. They come in a awesome handcarved case and they also plant trees with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa C

customer_reviews.title: Tooooooo big
customer_reviews.text: Everything but the hinges seem to be legit. They’re just too loose for my face and I have a large head so I have no clue who these would actually fit.
customer_reviews.author: Bangarang

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed yet poorly made
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses were incredibly appealing and offered a great conversation starter. They even floated in the water as promised. Unfortunately the screw came off and it did fall apart shortly after buying. I love the style of the glasses and enjoyed talking to others about why they should buy a pair. But after they came apart and I was unable to repair them people quickly turned away.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Came with a very deep scratch on the inside of one of the lenses. Appears to have happened when the lenses were installed into the frames. In addition to the scratch, the same lense had a major distortion right across your line of sight. Returned and bought a pair of Oakleys like I should have done in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

product_meta.title: Bamboo Wood Sunglasses - One of a kind Polarized handmade frames from 4ESTShades
product_meta.description:
Sunglasses Handmade from Bamboo & Made For You

Upgrade Your Sight & Your Style
-Great detail and care put in to ensure these etched bamboo frames stand out. 
-2 Tree’s Planted with every purchase!
-Polarized lens’s - UV400 lens block 100% harmful UVA & UVB Rays.
-Restore true color and vision while eliminating reflected light to protect eyes perfectly
-Stainless Steel double spring hinges for universal fit; Built to bend not break.
-Real original custom floating frames 

Eco-friendly Materials
All sunglasses from 4EST shades are handmade from natural & renewable resources to stand out & be eco conscious. The “Etched Bamboo” collection is new twist on our most popular designs. At our fans request we have used new materials to design some of our best glasses yet. Made from real raw bamboo these wayfarers are environmentally sustainable and built to look amazing. An authentic wood grain frame puts comfort first in an original style that fits men and women. On top of that we are committed to planting two trees with every purchas. No 4EST purchase would be complete without our standard packaging of a cloth drawstring pouch, Bamboo carrying case and newly included Microfiber cleaning cloth. We at 4EST Shades have been doing everything we can to bring to market great sunglasses. Our goal is to ensure quality and customer satisfaction over everything! 

Stand Out from the Crowd!
Not only will you look good, they are a serious conversation starter!
-Protect your eyes in style! out customers love the fit, feel and knowing they are protecting their eyes with these polarized lenses. 
-The perfect unique gift!
Amazon buyers love & trust 4EST Shades sunglasses to provide quality products with great customer care.
So of course all products from 4EST are backed by a 90-day money back guarantee. 

Limited Supply, Add to cart while supplies last!
feature_bullets: HANDCRAFTED BAMBOO FRAME SUNGLASSES - Designed from 100% Natural bamboo, not only is every pair durable and unique but we also plant 2 TREES with every purchase! Look great AND feel great for saving the environment in this bamboo frame
POLARIZED LENSES - Water, Snow, Driving or at the Beach our premium UV400 lenses offer antiglare & UVA/UVB protection from the sun - See the difference in our lens
100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - We are ALWAYS here for our customers! Try our brand new wood sunglasses yourself or as a gift. If you don't like them, return them for a full refund!

FREE BAMBOO CASE, CLOTH POUCH & MICROFIBRE CLOTH - Every Pair of 4EST Shades Comes equipped in a personalized Bamboo travel case & Cloth pouch for safe keeping. As a Bonus we now include a Microfibre Cleaning Cloth to ensure your shades are clean and protected!
